ValidationRule.description: When User Select RTGS of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then not entering data in Cheque/DD Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'RTGS') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c,'Rupees') , ISBLANK( Cheque_DD_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting RTGS of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection Pick List,Cheque/DD Date cann't be blank.
